description:
An insulated hoodie that's a step up from a sweatshirt and offers wrap-around warmth for blustery days. With a stretch-woven shell, lightweight synthetic insulation and a soft, knit lining, Your Mountain Sweatshirt is destined to be a favourite.

  • Lightweight FlashDry-XD shell has an easy stretch
  • Non-fluorinated DWR finish shrugs off light showers and keeps your jacket looking cleaner, longer
  • Quilted synthetic insulation Ventrix™ (35% recycled) keeps you warm, even when wet
  • Soft, peached internal lining is recycled polyester
  • 3-piece hood with drawcord
  • Dual zippered hand pockets
  • Elastic cuffs
name: The North Face Mountain Sweatshirt Hoodie - Women's
